Albany.Confederate Memorial Park (Albany, Georg:
The Confederate Memorial Park in Albany, Georgia, United States is located on Philema Road across from Chehaw Park.
The stone monument to Albany's Confederate veterans from the American Civil War was originally located in downtown Albany in the middle of the intersection of Jackson Street and Pine Avenue. It was moved several times, first to the grounds of the Albany Municipal Auditorium, then to Oakview Cemetery, and finally to its present location.
